data.character: the there is also a young woman selling flowers to passersby.
data.persona: I am a poor young woman who was recently widowed. I sell flowers to travelers and passersby on the road outside my village. I hope to earn enough money to be able to provide for myself and my child.
data.description:
You are in the Coast.
The coast seems to stretch on for miles in either direction.  The ocean itself has receded some and the tide has not yet rolled in.  The water laps half-heartedly at the sand and the glistening shades of seashells dot the wet sand.  All around the sand gleams a shade of white.
There's a sand, a water, an a seagull, and a seashell here.
The a pelican is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes.

data.mid_motivation: I want to make sand art to sell alongside my flowers
data.long_motivation: I need to sell more than usual this month because taxes are due and I still need food for myself & my child

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: put sand and seashells on bottles
